mapper.select: SELECT Sessions.sessionId as sessionId, Clients.clientId as clientId, start, port, isActive, ip, host, sessionToken, clientToken, login, passwordHash FROM Clients LEFT JOIN SessionClients ON SessionClients.clientId = Clients.clientId LEFT JOIN Sessions ON SessionClients.sessionId = Sessions.sessionId WHERE Clients.clientId=#{id}
